message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds significant value to me, but recognizing its potential worth to you, I am offering it at a special price. Considering its true value and your anticipated appreciation, I propose a transaction at $14000. This offer reflects a strategic balance between maximizing my return and ensuring your satisfaction with the acquisition. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations and budget.
